name: Stick Nodes 2D Object
summary: Learn about .NODES files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Stick Nodes and Stick Nodes Pro are stickfigure animation programs available for Android and iOS devices. Stick Nodes is a free program, while Stick Nodes Pro is a paid program that includes additional features.

After animators create a stickfigure or another item that can be animated in Stick Nodes, they can save that item as a NODES file. The animator can then reuse the NODES file in future animations or share the file with other Stick Nodes users, so those users can include the item in their animations. Many NODES files are available for download from Stick Nodes' official website.

description: A NODES file is a stickfigure, prop, weapon, or other item created by Stick Nodes, a 2D animation program. In Stick Nodes' documentation, all NODES files are referred to as stickfigures, even those that contain props, weapons, or other items. Both Stick Nodes and Stick Nodes Pro use NODES files.
